title: Translate Qualitative Data into Simulation Model with Help of LLMs
description: A research project study the benefits of using LLMs for translating qualitative data into ABM simulation. The system adopts human-AI workflow and produce Conceptual model, Decision rules, and a usabel Simulation model as final outputs.

title: Multi-Agent for Exploration
description: A Multi agent system built with python. the system experiments and compares different algorithms for exploration tasks in obscure static environment

title: Diet Visualisation
description: A visualisation project, generating static and interactive visualisations for environmeneal impact from diet and food consumption based on research by Scarborough et al. in 2023

title: Steam Chatbot
description: A chat bot built with Python. It can understand natural language and help users to find and buy their dream games.

title: Interpharma's Smart-Doctor
description: An application for buying products and medicines, scheduling appointment, and consulting with doctors and pharmacists in real time video calls, voice calls, and chat. The app supports both patients and doctors in a single platform.

title: Unicron App (User/Partner)
description: Mobile platform for partners to post jobs and services, allowing users to find and contract for work.

title: EV Rider
description: An on-demand transportation mobile application, connecting riders and passengers specifically designed for electric vehicle (EV) economy, featuring a ride-tracking system, find nearby battery changers.

title: Pepsi's internal app
description: Reward redeem application for internal staffs to spend their points for various items.

title: Life Portfolio
description: A Flutter app, plotting different aspects of individual life, allowing users to consider current state of their life, answering questions 'Are you happy' and 'What should be changed'.

title: Ocean Kitchen
description: A Godot game, played as a bubble pick up ingredients and use them to satisfied the gods who provided resources for the kitchen. The game also supports multi-players feature

title: Divisible Game
description: A Flutter game, players must find divisible numbers popup on the board within limited time

title: ProsnCons
description: An utility app helps users compare pros and cons of the considering option

title: AIdentity
description: Playing as a detective interrogating characters played by AI. Ask questions, analyze their responses, and identify who they are.

title: Waste Wise
description: A waste management practice card game. Matching objects with their correct waste categories, encouraging people to aware about environment and sustainability with a cozy vibe in game.

title: Cat Say Browser extension
description: A chrome extension that adds a cute cat on webpage. Users can select one from 7 cats and can interact by clicking on the cat to reveal humorous or motivational messages.

title: Pingko
description: A simple plinko game, testing physics and collisions system, built with Flutter

title: Iridescent Slide Puzzle
description: A small slide puzzle game implemented in Flutter
